description.ko: 유기적 식물학과 첨단 컴퓨팅의 융합을 나타내는 개념적 걸작으로, 실리콘과 빛을 통해 번성하는 생명력을 상징합니다.
description.en: A conceptual masterpiece representing the convergence of organic botany and advanced computing, where life thrives through silicon and light.

prompt: Hyper-realistic close-up of FLORA-9, a futuristic cybernetic flower with translucent obsidian petals interlaced with glowing neon cyan circuitry. The center of the flower is a pulsating core of golden data particles. Soft bokeh background of a digital rainforest with floating binary code streams and holographic mist. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, sharp focus on crystalline textures.
